pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:0.5: 2. The training rule on hair on the private parts
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.2: At that time the nuns from the group of six removed hair from their private parts. They then bathed naked at a ford in the river Aciravatī together with prostitutes.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.3: The prostitutes complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.4: “How can the nuns remove hair from the private parts? They are just like householders who indulge in sensual pleasures.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.5: The nuns heard the complaints of those prostitutes,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.6: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.7: “How can the nuns from the group of six remove hair from the private parts?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.8: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns did that?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.11: “How can the nuns from the group of six remove hair from the private parts?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.13: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.14: ‘If a nun removes hair from the private parts, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:2.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:2.8: if she removes one hair, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:2.9: Even if she removes many hairs, she commits one offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:2.11: if she does it because of illness;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:2.13: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:2.14: The second training rule is finished.
